item.title: 英国央行曼恩认为 100 个基点的减持过于激进
item.description: 英国央行官员凯瑟琳-曼（Catherine Mann）表示，在未来一年内将利率下调一个百分点将刺激通胀，这使她与她最新的同事以及货币政策委员会大多数成员认可的 "渐进 "方法形成了对立。【原文：Bank of England official Catherine Mann said cutting rates by a percentage point over the next year would fan inflation, placing her in opposition to her newest colleague and the “gradual” approach endorsed by the majority on the Monetary Policy Committee.】

item.title: 埃尔德森说，欧洲央行不能简单地 "看穿 "供应冲击
item.description: 欧洲中央银行执行董事会成员弗兰克-埃尔德森（Frank Elderson）说，欧洲中央银行再也不能忽视经济中的供应冲击了，因为这些冲击会给通货膨胀留下持久的印记。【原文：The European Central Bank can no longer afford to ignore supply shocks to the economy as they can leave a lasting imprint on inflation, Executive Board Member Frank Elderson said, adding they’re likely to emerge more often in the future.】

item.title: Instacart 首席执行官称华尔街低估了杂货科技的价值
item.description:
在本期《张慧卿巡回演讲》（Emily Chang）节目中，Instacart 首席执行官菲吉-西莫（Fidji Simo）分享了她重新构想公司计划背后的一些灵感。【原文：

On this episode of The Circuit with Emily Chang, Instacart CEO Fidji Simo shares some inspiration behind her plan to reimagine the company.

】

item.title: 英国制裁安哥拉多斯桑托斯打击黑钱行为
item.description: 英国政府制裁了三名被称为 "臭名昭著的盗贼 "的富豪，以打击黑钱流动。【原文：The UK government sanctioned three tycoons that it dubbed “notorious kleptocrats” in a fresh attempt to crack down on dirty money flows.】

item.title: 抵押贷款利率下降后，10 月份美国现房销售上升
item.description: 由于购房者利用了上个月抵押贷款利率下降的机会，10 月份美国旧房销售量创下了自今年年初以来的最大增幅。【原文：Sales of previously owned US homes rose in October by the most since earlier this year, as buyers took advantage of a dip in mortgage rates in the previous month.】

item.title: 英国称使用假证书逃避对俄罗斯石油的制裁
item.description: 英国制裁执行机构称，已发现有人利用伪造文件规避七国集团对俄罗斯石油出口的价格上限。【原文：The UK’s sanctions enforcement agency said it has identified cases where falsified documents are being used to evade a Group of Seven price cap on Russian oil exports.】

item.title: Groupe Dynamite 2024 年首次在加拿大上市，股价下跌 2
item.description: Groupe Dynamite 公司在多伦多首次公开募股 3 亿加元（2.15 亿美元）后股价下跌 2%，这是加拿大自 2023 年 3 月以来的首次企业上市。【原文：Groupe Dynamite Inc. shares fell 2% in Toronto after its C$300 million ($215 million) initial public offering, Canada’s first corporate listing since March 2023.】

item.title: 卡森-布洛克认为 "阳光地带 "的公寓大楼将面临麻烦
item.description: 卖空者卡森-布洛克（Carson Block）认为，继近年来写字楼遭受重创之后，公寓大楼将成为商业地产市场的下一个主要问题来源。【原文：Apartment complexes will be the next major source of problems in the commercial real estate market after offices were hit hard in recent years, according to the short seller Carson Block.】

item.title: 人工智能药物发现初创公司 Enveda 融资 1.3 亿美元
item.description:
迄今为止，人工智能仍未能改变医疗保健行业，但投资者正押注于人工智能的潜力。【原文：

AI has so far failed to transform health care, but investors are betting on its potential. 

】

item.title: 南非卡冈亚戈称通胀目标审查接近尾声
item.description: 南非储备银行行长莱塞特贾-卡冈亚戈（Lesetja Kganyago）表示，对其 3% 至 6% 通胀目标的审查已接近尾声。【原文：South African Reserve Bank Governor Lesetja Kganyago said a review of its 3% to 6% inflation target was getting close to the end.】

item.title: 特鲁多将在与左翼反对党的协议中推出减税措施
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的官员透露，贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）总理的政府将宣布一项数十亿美元的负担能力方案，其中包括临时减免联邦销售税。【原文：Prime Minister Justin Trudeau’s government will announce a multibillion dollar affordability package that includes temporary relief on the federal sales tax, according to an official familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 霍尔茨曼说，欧洲央行必须对价格风险采取限制性政策
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员罗伯特-霍尔兹曼（Robert Holzmann）表示，鉴于通胀风险挥之不去，欧洲中央银行的货币政策必须保持限制性。【原文：European Central Bank monetary policy must remain restrictive given lingering inflation risks, according to Governing Council member Robert Holzmann.】

item.title: 美国首次申请失业救济人数降至四月以来最低水平
item.description: 美国失业救济金申请人数上周意外降至 4 月份以来的最低水平，表明就业市场稳健。【原文：Applications for US unemployment benefits unexpectedly fell last week to the lowest level since April, illustrating a solid job market.】

item.title: 据说 PBB 债券销售将使银行背负一大笔债务
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，德意志票据交换所（Deutsche Pfandbriefbank AG）自陷入美国商业地产漩涡以来的首次大规模债券销售失败后，银行被数亿德意志票据交换所的新债所困。【原文：Banks were stuck with hundreds of millions of Deutsche Pfandbriefbank AG’s new debt after the company’s first big bond sale since it was caught in the US commercial real estate maelstrom fell flat, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 南非绩优服装零售商销售额攀升，创历史新高
item.description: 南非业绩最好的服装零售商普莱斯先生集团有限公司（Mr Price Group Ltd.）计划在本财政年度下半年开设更多门店，此前销售额的上升使其股价创下历史新高。【原文：Mr Price Group Ltd., South Africa’s top performing clothing retailer, plans to open more stores in the second half of its financial year after rising sales lifted its shares to a record.】

item.title: S.非洲中央银行谨慎降息四分之一个百分点
item.description: 南非央行在连续第二次会议上下调了借贷成本，并表示其模型显示将进一步下调借贷成本，但前景仍极具不确定性。【原文：South Africa’s central bank lowered borrowing costs for a second successive meeting and said its modeling showed further cuts were in the offing, but that the outlook remains highly uncertain.】

item.title: 肯尼亚总统鲁托取消阿达尼机场和输电线交易计划
item.description: 肯尼亚总统威廉-鲁托（William Ruto）取消了授予阿达尼集团公司修建输电线和运营肯尼亚主要机场的特许权协议的计划。【原文：Kenyan President William Ruto canceled plans to award Adani Group companies concession deals to construct power lines and to run the nation’s main airport.】

item.title: 瑞典海军完成对断裂数据电缆附近海床的研究
item.description: 瑞典海军完成了对波罗的海受损数据电缆附近海床的勘测，北欧国家正在调查水下基础设施可能遭到的破坏。【原文：Sweden’s Navy completed a survey of the seabed near one of the damaged data cables in the Baltic Sea as the Nordic country investigates potential sabotage against the underwater infrastructure.】

item.title: 希腊货币与金融管理局称希腊明年将出售80亿欧元新债券
item.description: 希腊公共债务管理机构负责人表示，希腊计划在2025年出售多达80亿欧元（84亿美元）的新债券。【原文：Greece plans to sell as much as €8 billion euros ($8.4 billion) of new bonds in 2025, the head of the country’s Public Debt Management Agency said.】

item.title: 尼日利亚立法者批准 22.1 亿美元对外借款计划
item.description: 尼日利亚立法者批准了总统博拉-蒂努布（Bola Tinubu）关于向外国投资者借款 22.1 亿美元以弥补今年预算缺口的提议。【原文：Nigerian lawmakers approved a proposal by President Bola Tinubu to borrow $2.21 billion from foreign investors to plug a shortfall in this year’s budget.】

item.title: 棕榈油作为世界 "万能油 "的地位受到挑战
item.description:
丰富的植物油不再是最便宜的，这威胁到了它的市场份额。【原文：

The abundant vegetable oil is no longer the cheapest, threatening its commanding market share.

】

item.title: 卡森-布洛克预计特朗普将发表更多反卖方言论
item.description: 浑水资本公司（Muddy Waters Capital）首席执行官卡森-布洛克（Carson Block）预计，在唐纳德-特朗普执政期间，会有更多针对做空者的言论。【原文：Muddy Waters Capital’s Chief Executive Officer Carson Block expects more rhetoric against short sellers during Donald Trump’s administration.】

item.title: 英伟达黄仁勋传播人工智能福音，寻找更多客户
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.首席执行官黄仁勋（Jensen Huang）发现，他为扩大其市场领先的人工智能芯片的客户群所做的努力是有代价的。但首先...【原文：Nvidia Corp. CEO Jensen Huang is finding that his push to expand the customer base for his market-leading AI chips comes at a cost. But first...】

item.description: 我是贾雷尔-迪拉德，驻华盛顿特区的经济记者。今天我们将探讨美国房地产市场的前景。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net，或通过 @economics 在 X 上与我们联系。如果您还没有注册接收本新闻通讯，可以在这里注册。【原文：I’m Jarrell Dillard, an economics reporter in Washington, DC. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 特朗普关税言论对美国出口商构成的风险
item.description: 在有关当选总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税计划的公开辩论中，大多数关注的焦点都集中在更高的关税将如何伤害美国进口商和消费者。但是，为海外市场制造商品的美国企业在贸易战中也会损失惨重。【原文：In the public debate over President-elect Donald Trump’s tariff plans, most of the concern centers on how higher duties will hurt US importers and consumers. But American industries that manufacture goods for overseas markets also have a lot to lose in trade wars.】

item.title: 走后门的私人信贷基金吸引保险业数十亿资金
item.description: 全球最大的私人信贷管理公司正在转向一种不起眼的投资产品，以帮助从财大气粗的保险公司筹集数十亿资金，这是对旨在遏制风险的行业保障措施极限的考验。【原文：The world’s biggest private credit managers are turning to an obscure investment product to help raise billions from deep-pocketed insurance companies, testing the limits of industry safeguards meant to curb risk.】

item.title: 马斯克-特朗普联盟让海湾财富基金盯上更多美国交易
item.description: 在美国总统大选前的几周，阿拉伯联合酋长国最有影响力的王室之一会见了埃隆-马斯克。选举结果揭晓几天后，沙特阿拉伯公共投资基金（Public Investment Fund）负责人与唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）以及帮助他入主白宫的特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc.【原文：In the weeks leading up to the US presidential election, one of the United Arab Emirates’ most influential royals met with Elon Musk. Days after the results were clear, the head of Saudi Arabia’s Public Investment Fund was pictured alongside Donald Trump and the Tesla Inc. chief who helped put him in the White House.】

item.title: 中国市场萎靡不振，Temu 所有者 PDD 的销售大幅放缓
item.description: PDD Holdings Inc. 公布的销售额未达预期，使人们更加担心中国经济放缓对中国最大科技公司的伤害超过预期。【原文：PDD Holdings Inc. reported sales that missed estimates, lending weight to fears that China’s slowdown is hurting its biggest tech companies more than anticipated.】

item.title: 沃尔玛股价将迎来史诗般的一年，塔吉特却在下滑
item.description: 本周沃尔玛和塔吉特的财报加剧了零售商股票在 2024 年的走势分化。【原文：This week’s earnings reports from Walmart and Target are exacerbating the divergence in the retailers’ stocks in 2024.】

item.title: 分析师追赶现实，英伟达预测魔力褪去
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）超预期的业绩令大多数公司羡慕不已，但在两年内股价涨幅超过 800% 之后，"好 "对华尔街来说已不再是好事。【原文：Nvidia Corp.’s estimate-beating results would be the envy of most companies, but after a more than 800% share-price gain in two years, great is no longer good enough for Wall Street.】
